| History                 = Umbral Dynamics was a mysterious organization who hired the services of [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]] and his [[Mercs for Money (Earth-616)|Mercs for Money]] to apprehend several individuals they claimed were a danger to themselves and others due to being a potential source of radiation. Their targets included [[Ellie Phimister (Earth-616)|Negasonic Teenage Warhead]],{{r|Deadpool & the Mercs for Money Vol 2 1}} [[Chen Lu (Earth-616)|Radioactive Man]],{{r|Deadpool & the Mercs for Money Vol 2 2}} and [[Ralph Roberts (Earth-616)|Cobalt Man]].

While dropping off the latter of the targets to Umbral Dynamics, undercover Umbral agent [[Aaron Stack (Impostor) (Earth-616)|Machine Man]] revealed to Deadpool that atrocious things hid behind the company's façade.{{r|Deadpool & the Mercs for Money Vol 2 4}} Deadpool subsequently infiltrated Umbral's headquarters in [[Bagalia]] in order to fix his mistake and rescue Negasonic Teenage Warhead. During the rescue operation, he discovered Umbral Dynamic's CEO [[Caroline Le Fay (Earth-616)|Caroline Le Fay]] had used the combined powers of the targets to bring back the [[Sergei Krylov (Earth-616)|Presence]] to life.{{r|Deadpool & the Mercs for Money Vol 2 4}}
